name: ListEnvironmentEvaluations
description:
Retrieve evaluations for a specific project environment.

Call this tool to obtain a list of evaluations for the environment of a specified project in Datadog. Useful for monitoring and analyzing environment performance and configurations.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project to access evaluations. Retrieve via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: evaluation_ids
parameters.description: List of evaluation IDs to filter results. Multiple IDs allowed, separated by commas.

value_schema.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page in the environment evaluations list.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: results_offset_index
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results, allowing pagination control.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: evaluation_ordering
parameters.description: Specify the ordering of results. Use created_at, updated_at, or name, with optional '-' for descending.

value_schema.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)
* `name` - Name
* `-name` - Name (descending)

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Search in the evaluation's name or description. Use this to filter results by specific keywords.

parameters.name: filter_by_enabled_status
parameters.description: Filter by enabled (true) or disabled (false) evaluations.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id__in
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

value_schema.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)
* `name` - Name
* `-name` - Name (descending)

value_schema.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)
* `name` - Name
* `-name` - Name (descending)

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
